mapper.insert: insert into test( loginId, loginPw, name, email, nickName, status, createTime, loginFlag, profile )values ( #{loginId}, #{loginPw}, #{name}, #{email}, #{nickName}, IFNULL(#{status}, 'N'), NOW(), IFNULL(#{loginFlag}, '0'), NULL )
mapper.select: SELECT loginId FROM test WHERE loginId =#{id}
